content: the amberly preemie hat was designed with closed textured stitches to provide a cozy embrace that feels like a gentle hug the use of baby yarn ensures its soft and comfy against delicate skin making it ideal for donation to charity organizations supporting preemies this hat features in the 2024 preemie crochet challenge hosted by sunflower cottage crochet fits 3-5 lbs crown diameter = 3 ½ circumference = 11 height = 4 materials needed #3 bernat baby sport @ 24 yds us g hook 4 mm if you would like to join my facebook group to share your make www facebook com/groups/simplymelaniejane sign up for my newsletter here https //bit ly/smjnewsletter this pattern and its images are copyright protected and the sole property of simply melanie jane please do not redistribute transfer or sell the pattern or alter it to claim as your own you may sell any products you create from this pattern please credit the designer by linking online listings
